Articles.Content:
I'm having problems with the export from 3ds max. I've imported the fuel tank and tried exporting it to test if everything is working, but the game just hangs in the loading screen. The parts lab displays a KeyNotFoundException. All the objects have materials, the units and orientation are set correctly. The dae exporter is updated to the newest version. I exported models before with the 2010 version (which worked perfectly), but since I installed 2012 that one uses the new exporter plugin too. When exported with the 2010 version it now gives a NullReferenceException in the parts lab.

Anybody know what's the problem here ?

Seems like it's how you organized your folders, maybe not the export itself. That's generally what happens with the loading screen issue.

Our mod SkunkMonkey has a thread about proper mod folder formats: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=997.0
